content: 6 rounds garter stitch section k2tog around -16 32 sts remaining knit straight until the work measures 3 75 7 25 | 9 5cm 18 5cm from the knit 1 3 rounds cast on edge k2tog around -8 16 sts remaining joining the sides you will now fold your work in half to large size only - knit 1 round then form the sides of the basket fold the k2tog around -8 sts remaining garter stitch section up to meet the stockinette section so the basket has a break yarn and draw through the garter stitch outside and a reverse remaining 8 sts weave in ends stockinette aka purl inside this is like abbreviations k2tog knit two stitches together st/sts stitch/stitches - 2 - corrugated basket copyright alecia hornfeldt 2021 knitting the cast on edge together with the current work fold the garter stitch section up to meet the stockinette section insert your right needle through the first stitch from the cast on edge the photo shows me already a few stitches into this round you will be picking up the first stitch to the left of the yarn tail from your cast on insert your right needle into the next stitch on your left needle knit these two stitches together - 3 - corrugated basket copyright alecia hornfeldt 2021
